item.title: SSS #2 - Considering about genre, and some sketches
item.description: Hey guys. This is my second update. I really wanted to do a weekly update, but I couldn’t do it last week. It seemed to me that there was nothing worth showing to everyone. A friend said to me, “You should update your development blog every week. And see if it’s better to look good or to be forgotten by everyone. Maybe it’s worth it to write that development isn’t going well.

item.title: SSS #1 - Introduce
item.description: Hello everyone, Thank you for your interest in my work and for coming here. On March 2, 2021, I posted a pixel art on twitter. WIP #gamedev #Indiegamedev pic.twitter.com/BcddyRq7Xr — SLOTET (@slotet_pixel) March 2, 2021 This is the concept art for my game, which I drew little by little in between contract jobs. As many of you may know, this pixel art was seen by quite a few people. This is the first time in my life that I’ve done this, so I was very surprised, and more than anything, I was happy to see the warm response from you guys.
